title: Samsung Unpacked 2022 will be hosted in the metaverse this year — here’s where to watch
content:
Every year, Samsung holds its Unpacked event, debuting the latest and greatest of its device lines. This year is a little bit different – there are a few extra options for tuning in. Where and when can you watch Samsung Unpacked 2022? Our guide gives you all the details on how to join this year’s event.

more…

The post Samsung Unpacked 2022 will be hosted in the metaverse this year — here’s where to watch appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Unpacked 2022 is coming up fast and with an extra viewing location this year. Here's where you can watch Samsung Unpacked 2022.
